data.title: MI FU AND THE CLASSICAL TRADITION OF CHINESE CALLIGRAPHY
data.meta_description: Princeton: Princeton University Press, 1979. Quarto; VG-/G+; Hardcover with DJ; DJ spine, black with white print; DJ has slight edgewear, slight shelfwear; Boards quarter bound with black cloth to spine and grey cloth to boards, slight wear to spine caps and corners, else clean and strong; Text block clean and tight; xi, 131 pages + 50 pages of b&w plates, frontispiece. Shelf: East Asian Art
data.text:
Quarto; VG-/G+; Hardcover with DJ; DJ spine, black with white print; DJ has slight edgewear, slight shelfwear; Boards quarter bound with black cloth to spine and grey cloth to boards, slight wear to spine caps and corners, else clean and strong; Text block clean and tight; xi, 131 pages + 50 pages of b&w plates, frontispiece. [Shelf: East Asian Art]

Oversized order. Additional shipping and handling may be necessary for expedited/international orders. Economy international shipping unavailable due to size/weight restriction(s). Contact seller if you have any questions.

NOTE: Shelved in Netdesk office, in wraparound bookcase next to 15's.
